venue.name: The Center for Arts in Natick

item.description:
This event involves two (2) costs: Dinner + Tickets for Show. Johnny is quite popular and tickets will go fast. I have negotiated with TCAN for a reduced ticket cost of $23 for the show. To get this rate, I have to collect the money from you for the show and charge what I receive to my personal credit card. So, if I don't receive the checks, you will be on your own for tickets. TCAN has reserved seats for us based on my collecting the money and presenting it to them for a group discounted rate.

Please make checks out in the amount of $23 payable to: Richard D'Apollo.

TCAN has extended my final count date to January 6th

Send Checks to:
Richard D'Apollo
95 Outlook Drive
Worcester, MA 01602

The plan for Friday night, Feb 19, 2010 is:

Agostino's for Food at 6:00 PM SHARP !!!!!
23 Washington Street
Natick, MA 01760
508-655-6643

then on to TCAN for Blues by 7:30 PM to make the 8:00 PM show at:

The Center for the Arts in Natick (TCAN)
14 Summer Street
Natick, MA 01760

If you want to purchase tickets on your own, the number for Tickets and Information is 508.647.0097
If you do this, we won't be able to sit together. That is why I need the checks.


JOHNNY A.
"...his guitar creates dense musical shadings, conveying nostalgia, regret, hope and intrigue..." -- Jazz Times

Guitar-slinger Johnny A. grew up listening to Eric Clapton and Jimi Hendrix before cutting his teeth leading a short string of blues-rock bands. But the Bostonian bluesman really came of age in the early '90s as a member of J. Geils Band front man Peter Wolf's Houseparty 5.

Everything he learned about supporting a song by knowing when to show off (and, more important, when not to) has been incorporated into his now elegant style: a potent blend of rock, jazz and blues tied together by a sweet tone and a constant emphasis on melody.

TCAN website [/url]
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Rich at Agostino's before the show. Be at the restaurant by 6 PM. We can walk to TCAN from Agostino's.
item.name: Dinner & Johnny A Jazz/Blues Guitarist
